text.p: Use the same [mathjaxinline]\mathcal{B}[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] as in the previous problem. The vector [mathjaxinline]z = \left[\begin{array}{c} -3 \\ 6 \\ 7 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline] is an element of [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: We can find [mathjaxinline]z[/mathjaxinline] as a linear combination of [mathjaxinline]v_1[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]v_2[/mathjaxinline] by row reduction. We get that [mathjaxinline]z = 3v_1 - 2v_2[/mathjaxinline], so [mathjaxinline][z]_{\mathcal{B}} = \left[\begin{array}{c} 3 \\ -2 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline].
